title: The Man in the Raincoat
occurrences: The police are looking for the man in the raincoat... and that's you!
He claims the man in the raincoat didn't kill Eva.
Don't forget the insurance, and the man in the raincoat. See you at 7!
The solution to your problems is... The Man in the Raincoat!
The Man in the Raincoat? - That's who the police are looking for.
Good! Imagine they find the man in the raincoat at the crime scene...
That the man in the raincoat was a suicide... remorse... despair.
So... the man in the raincoat this evening at 7 PM...
Maurice! You'll take care of the man in the raincoat, eh?
regex: \b((?!\bMan\ in\ the\ Raincoat:)Man\ in\ the\ Raincoat)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
